summary: A collection of test utilities for Certbot that supplies base test case classes, mock plugins, and helper functions for loading certificates, CSRs, and keys, as well as utilities for patching display components and managing temporary directories.
business_intent: Enable developers to write concise, reliable unit tests for Certbot by providing reusable scaffolding, mock objects, and cryptographic loading helpers, thereby streamlining test development and ensuring isolated test environments.
